title: Steins;Gate: Heiji Kyokusen no Epigraph
original_name: Steins;Gate 閉時曲線のエピグラフ
sinopse: This is a story of what happened to a certain Okabe in the Beta Attractor Field. It offers an interesting look at Attractor Field Beta and introduces a couple of new characters, one of which is Kurisu's senior lab partner.
